Chef Jimmy

Developed a passion for cooking, learning from the finest from a Michelin-starred restaurant and now cooking a storm in this vibrant city with a taste for great food. Here Jimmy shares about what inspires him through his menu.

Jimmy and Roy both shared a goal and aims to provide the community with high quality comfort food made with the freshest ingredients possible.
